welcome_message_body: Welcome to Childwall, a charming town in the heart of the United Kingdom. Known for its picturesque streets, historical landmarks, and friendly locals, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our beautiful city has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Liverpool John Lennon Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chester Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Warton Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Warton Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest and busiest terminal at Manchester Airport, serving a variety of international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A modern terminal at Manchester Airport, primarily serving European and some long-haul flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Manchester Airport, mainly serving low-cost and leisure airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but a premium option is also available for faster speeds.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal caters to VIP and private charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
